body_html: How are you mounting? with -v on the docker run? Are they read-only? If you copy the checkpoint into the docker cotnainer rather than -v mounted directory does it work (slightly different than just pre-loading it into the image)?
body_text: How are you mounting? with -v on the docker run? Are they read-only? If you copy the checkpoint into the docker cotnainer rather than -v mounted directory does it work (slightly different than just pre-loading it into the image)?
body: How are you mounting? with -v on the docker run? Are they read-only? If you copy the checkpoint into the docker cotnainer rather than -v mounted directory does it work (slightly different than just pre-loading it into the image)?
